title: Dragon scimitar (or)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The dragon scimitar (or) is a dragon scimitar with a dragon scimitar ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the scimitar. It costs 760,186 for both the parts to make the dragon scimitar (or).

The dragon scimitar (or) is a dragon scimitar with a dragon scimitar ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the scimitar. It costs 760,186 for both the parts to make the dragon scimitar (or).

While the scimitar is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable scimitar and ornament kit.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Despite being gold-trimmed, the item's name is inconsistent with most other ornamented dragon equipment, which have (g) at the end of their names rather than (or). The scimitar shares this inconsistency with the dragon defender (t).

[[File:Dragon scimitar (or) detail.png|left|145px]]
The '''dragon scimitar (or)''' is a [[dragon scimitar]] with a [[dragon scimitar ornament kit]] attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the scimitar. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Dragon scimitar}}+{{GEP|Dragon scimitar ornament kit}}}} for both the parts to make the dragon scimitar (or).

While the scimitar is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable scimitar and ornament kit.
